nodes.text: A Bardiche was a type of bladed polearm. During the Seventh Battle of Ruusan, the member of the Brotherhood of Darkness who captured Jedi Lord Berethon had a Lanvarok with a bardiche blade.

Bardiche was first mentioned in the 2014 fifth entry in the Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut series of posts by Jason Fry on the StarWars.com blog. The article featured content cut from The Essential Guide to Warfare a book released in 2012 by Fry.
